raw_code: var vector = ee.FeatureCollection.randomPoints(ee.Geometry.Rectangle([116.3, 39.8, 116.5, 40.0]), 10); Map.addLayer(vector.style({width: 3, color: 'red'}), {}, 'Vector Line Width');
processing step: Generate random points within a specified rectangle to create a feature collection
Style the feature collection with a specified line width and color
Add the styled feature collection to the map
output: Styled vector layer on the map
